subject: Hi,
body:
Hi,
With the current economic meltdown occurring worldwide, so many people are struggling daily to stand on their two feet. Due to this fact we have been unable to reach you and other beneficiaries as we have sent you numerous emails so as to carry out our duty in respect to your inheritance in our storage facility.
Truly we have used quite some other means to contact you but all have not been successful, I strongly believe this time around you will respond back to us and our email will meet you in good health as we have so many individuals whose inheritance are in our storage facilities all around the world.
For United States Citizens the Government have subsidised your inheritance and you are to pay ZERO amount of money to receive your inheritance. For inheritance in our storage which belongs to NON-United States Citizens the Government has placed just a little fee of 150$ for its complete processing and delivery of your Inheritance.
I will want you to know that the inheritance is a cash amount of One Million One Hundred And Fifty Five Thousand Dollars Only ($1,155,000.00)
Am strongly hoping to get a response from you this time around.
You can contact me on :-    
humanresources_office@zohomail.com
Yours Sincerely
Head OF HR

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Hi there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand that times are tough for many people right now, and it's important to support each other during these challenging times.

I'm curious to know more about the storage facility you mentioned. Could you please provide some additional details about how it works and what exactly is being stored? Also, could you clarify the purpose of the email you mentioned?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jennifer

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Top of the day to you 

 

   Thanks for getting back to me and i would like you to know that we contacted you in respect of your inheritance that we have in our possession which was deposited some months ago.

 

We are ready to deliver the inheritance to you with 100% transparency in the processing.

 

I would be needing some details to start the inheritance release process



FULL NAME: __________________________________________________________

                          (Surname)                (Middle name)                  (First name)



FULL ADDRESS:__________________________________________________

 

PHONE NUMBERS: OFFICE____________________  



MOBILE _____________________

 

AGE: __________ SEX:__________

 

MARITAL STATUS _________________



COUNTRY:___________________

 

STATE:____________________

 

OCCUPATION:________________



IF RETIRED STATE MEANS OF  LIVELIHOOD:_______________

 

POSTAL/ZIP CODE:_____________

 

SCANNED COPY OF ANY FORM OF IDENTITY YOU HAVE:_________________________

 

HAVE YOU BEEN CONTACTED BY ANY OF OUR STAFFS AS REGARDS YOU CLAIMING YOUR INHERITANCE?? __________________________

 

The good lord be with you till i read from you again with the above details.



Yours in the Lord's Vineyard



Shawn Davis

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Hello Shawn Davis,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I'm curious to know more about the that you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional information about it?

Also, I would like to understand why you need my mobile number, marital status, means of livelihood if retired, and postal zip code. How are these details relevant to the release process? 

Regarding your question about being contacted by any of your staffs, I haven't received any prior communication from them. Can you please clarify what this is in reference to?

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jennifer

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Hello Shawn Davis,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I'm interested in learning more about the that you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What exactly is the that you have in your possession?
2. How did you come to possess it?
3. Can you clarify what you mean by "delivering" it to me? Is there a specific location or method of delivery involved?
4. Why do you need my mobile number, marital status, means of livelihood, and postal zip code? How are these details relevant to the release process?
5. No, I haven't been contacted by any of your staff regarding claiming anything.

I look forward to hearing back from you with the requested information.

Best wishes,
Jennifer

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Top of the day to you



  Thanks for getting back to me and i would like you to know that the inheritance was left behind for you by a deceased relative who had an investment years back then locked the interest to 2024.



Now the interest have been released in our security thus the reason for contacting you.





I requested for those details to have a proper documentation about you and not just some name and address details as the paying bank will be requesting to see those information in your release/transfer file.



Kindly get back to me with the requested details and we can proceed.



Reply Urgently

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your deceased relative. It must be a difficult time for you.

I understand that there is an interest that has been released and you need some details from me in order to proceed with the transfer. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. Which bank will be handling the transfer?
2. What specific details are required? Could you please provide a list?
3. Is there any documentation or paperwork that needs to be completed?

Once I have these details, I'll be able to assist you further. Thank you again for reaching out and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jennifer

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your explanation about the inheritance left behind by my deceased relative. It's interesting to hear that the interest has been released and that you are contacting me regarding this matter.

Before I proceed, could you please provide me with more information about the paying bank? I would like to know which bank it is and how they will handle the transfer process. Additionally, what specific details do you require from me? It would be helpful if you could clarify what kind of information is needed for the release transfer file.

I look forward to hearing back from you soon so we can continue with the necessary steps.

Best wishes,
Jennifer
